content.rendered:
Custom VIP 2023 Final Four Packages

Design your own personalized 2023 Men’s Final Four travel package to Houston with the help of our knowledgeable Sports Travel Specialists. Your custom-crafted Final Four travel experience includes your preferred tickets in NRG Stadium for both semi-finals and the championship final, first-class accommodations in Houston, admission to the Fan Fest interactive experience, and more.

There aren’t many sporting events that can match the nail-biting excitement and passion of March Madness, especially the Final Four. Next spring, 68 collegiate teams comprised of the country’s best and brightest amateur athletes in the game of basketball will compete for the title of National Champions. You could be there to experience the pinnacle games of the College Basketball Season! Custom 2023 Final Four packages are available now from $2,125 per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2023 Final Four

In 2023 the Final Four is headed to Houston. This exciting city is eager to welcome basketball fans as they prepare for the culmination of March Madness. The two national semi-final matches will take place on April 1, 2023 and the national championship final will follow on April 3rd. All games will take place at NRG Stadium, home of the NFL’s Houston Texans.
